SignInThirdPartyMsg: Sign In with your favorite social service
BeginToPlaySports: Begin to play sports with interest and pleasure!
UnderWelcomeMessage: With SportNode you will easily do your favorite workouts according to predefined schedule!
UnderWelcomeMessage2: The application is highly scalable and can be used on mobiles and tablets as well as on large screens.
PromoTileScheduleText: Allows to easily create a workout schedule!
PromoTileTimerText: Counts the time of relaxation between sets!
PromoTileMotivationText: Exercise cards change color from green to red with increasing need to do the exercise!
AddNewExercisePeriod: Enter a period between workouts (in days)
AboutSchedulerHeader: We came up with an alternative way of planning workouts based on your priorities!
AboutSchedulerExampleHeader: For example, you decided to thoroughly strengthen the abdominal muscles, a little to develop the muscles of the hands and just to keep in tone the legs and shoulders:
AboutSchedulerExample2Html: Muscles of the hands — on the second place;
AboutSchedulerAlmostDoneHtml: Making a list of priorities, consider that you have already done most of the work on planning.
AboutSchedulerExampleTableHeader: In our system, the schedule will look like this:
AboutSchedulerExercisePeriodTitle: Priority — this is the number of days between performing exercises
ExerciseOnAbdominalBenchTitle: Exercises on the bench for the abdominal muscles
AboutSchedulerSimplePlanningWarning1Html: Common planning of training program — is a very complicated process that takes a lot of time.
AboutSchedulerSimplePlanningWarning2Html: Choosing the common schedulers, you get the schedule, often tied to the days of the week and poorly allow any deviations.
AboutSchedulerSimplePlanningWarning3Html: For example, missing (for some reason) of trainings scheduled for Tuesday, you run the risk of knock training schedule for the entire week.
AboutSchedulerDoneAbstract: Due to the fact that priority is determined by number of days break between performing exercises, the schedule is ready!
AboutSchedulerResult1Html: Exercises on the bench for the abdominal muscles will be performed every other day;
AboutSchedulerResult2Html: Push-ups and pull-ups — on every third day (skipping 2 days);
AboutSchedulerResult3Html: Sit-ups и side lateral raise — on every fourth day (skipping 3 days).
AboutSchedulerCardsOrderDescriptionTitle: This schedule will be displayed in the form of cards marked with a certain color. The order of the cards will determine the priority of exercises.
AboutSchedulerCardsOrderDescription1Html: Having performed the exercise, it is marked with green, indicating that it is done for today;
AboutSchedulerCardsOrderDescription2Html: Yellow card means that today it is necessary to perform the exercise;
AboutSchedulerCardsOrderDescription3Html: If exercise is not done in a proper day, the next day its card will colored with red, and it will move into the top of the queue.
AboutSchedulerConclusion: This approach allows performing of missed training in the future according to a predefined priority. After a while you again bring all the cards to the green status and will continue trainings according to the schedule.
